summary: Email exchange between FBI Special Agent and Victim Specialist regarding an Epstein victim named Elisabetta, who was represented by attorney Gloria Allred. The FBI notes Allred made direct communication with victims difficult, but resources were provided. The victim's current contact information is not available as she refused to provide it.

persons.name: Elisabetta
persons.context: Epstein victim who was represented by attorney Gloria Allred; she refused to provide current contact information to the FBI.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Represented Elisabetta and made it difficult for the FBI to speak directly with the victims she represented.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk, responding about resources provided to Elisabetta.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist from the New York Division who forwarded a message from a victim regarding Elisabetta.

connections.description: Gloria Allred represented Elisabetta as her attorney in matters related to being an Epstein victim.
FBI Special Agent provided victim resource information to Elisabetta through her attorney.
FBI Victim Specialist received a message about Elisabetta from another victim and forwarded it to the Special Agent.

events.title: Victim message about Elisabetta
events.description: FBI Victim Specialist received a text message from a victim in a separate human trafficking case regarding Epstein victim Elisabetta.

events.title: FBI response on victim resources
events.description: FBI Special Agent responded that victim resources were provided to Elisabetta through her attorney Gloria Allred, but direct communication was blocked.

keyFacts: Epstein victim Elisabetta was represented by attorney Gloria Allred.
Gloria Allred made it difficult for the FBI to speak directly with the victims she represented, requiring all correspondence to go through her.
The FBI provided victim resource information to Elisabetta through Allred, but does not have her current contact information as she refused to provide it.
The communication occurred in November 2024, indicating ongoing FBI engagement with Epstein victims years after his death.
The FBI notes Elisabetta is welcome to reach out for additional services if needed.
